channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sony Days of Play Sale: Consoles, Games, and More
item.description: From games to consoles to accessories, Sony PlayStation gear is heavily discounted through June 12.

item.title: General Catalyst-backed Jasper Health lays off staff
item.description: Jasper Health, a cancer care platform startup, laid off a substantial part of its workforce, TechCrunch has learned. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights res...

item.title: Google's AI Overviews Will Always Be Broken. That's How AI Works
item.description: Google rushed out fixes after its AI search feature made errors that went viral. Fundamental limitations of generative AI mean that it will still scre...

item.title: Live Nation confirms Ticketmaster was hacked, says personal information stolen in data breach
item.description: Live Nation says its Ticketmaster subsidiary was hacked. A hacker claims to be selling 560 million customer records. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights res...

item.title: It's the AI Election Year

item.title: Dyson's Airstrait and Airwrap Hair Tools Are $100 Off Right Now
item.description: Banish puff and frizz with these discounted flat irons and blow dryers from Dyson and beyond.

item.title: Hacked, leaked, exposed: Why you should never use stalkerware apps
